item.title: Lil' help :D
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:2, topic:229204”]Haha i can easily do this for you…

first…

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 999999999); sendMessage("money!"); }

ok then well lets say where you need to post it… if your using devolution then search for this

oadd

then under that command at the last bracket }
you can paste your command… and then compile and see what it says

so it should look like this

[code] }
if (command.equals(“oadd”) && (playerRights > 3)) {
if (adding)
adding = false;
else
adding = true;
sendMessage("Object logging " + adding);
}

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") && playerRights >= 0)
  		{
		addItem(995, 999999999);
		sendMessage("money!");
	}[/code][/quote]

No no, this coding wont work for Dodian sources… Dodian uses a diff sort of language… eg. sendMessage is sM

Read full topic

item.title: Lil' help :D
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Haha i can easily do this for you…

first…

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 999999999); sendMessage("money!"); }

ok then well lets say where you need to post it… if your using devolution then search for this

oadd

then under that command at the last bracket }
you can paste your command… and then compile and see what it says

so it should look like this

[code] }
if (command.equals(“oadd”) && (playerRights > 3)) {
if (adding)
adding = false;
else
adding = true;
sendMessage("Object logging " + adding);
}

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") && playerRights >= 0)
  		{
		addItem(995, 999999999);
		sendMessage("money!");
	}[/code]

item.title: Lil' help :D

item.description:
@davedave wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(995, 999999999);
sendMessage(“money!”);
}

Can somebody please translate into Dodian? Or atleast show me where to or how to?
